item.title: Looking for Work: New Grad Edition
item.description: After four years of searching for internships, my time has finally come to look for a full-time job. This is a “reverse job posting”, where I’ll be describing what I offer as a candidate, but focusing more on what I’m looking for in a company. I’m doing this because the sheer of amount of “Software Engineer, New Grad” positions out there is mildly overwhelming (there’s an entire git repo dedicated to the 2021 new grad search), and I want to try nailing down what I’m actually looking for.
